required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Characteristic of Axial Pain and EEG Analysis of Patients After Laminoplasty
clinical_study.official_title: The Characteristic of Axial Pain After Open-door Laminoplasty in Patients With Degenerative Cervical Spine Myelopathy and the Correlation With EEG Analysis: a Prospective Cohort Study.

brief_summary.textblock: The characteristic of axial pain and EEG analysis of patients after laminoplasty

detailed_description.textblock: The characteristic of axial pain after open-door laminoplasty in patients with degenerative cervical spine myelopathy and the correlation with electroencephalogram analysis: a prospective cohort study.

primary_outcome.description: Electroencephalogram analysis (focus on the gamma oscillation at prefrontal cortex) at 3-month follow-up.
Electroencephalogram analysis (focus on the gamma oscillation at prefrontal cortex) at 1-year follow-up.

primary_outcome.measure: Visual analogue scale for axial pain
primary_outcome.description: Visual analogue scale for axial pain before operation and at 3-month follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Visual analogue scale for axial pain
primary_outcome.description: Visual analogue scale for axial pain before operation and at 1-year follow-up

secondary_outcome.description: Neck Disability Index score before operation and at 3-month follow-up
Neck Disability Index score before operation and at 1-year follow-up
SF-36 score before operation and at 3-month follow-up
SF-36 score before operation and at 1-year follow-up
Beck Depression Inventory score before operation and at 3-month follow-up
Beck Depression Inventory score before operation and at 1-year follow-up
Beck Anxiety Inventory score before operation and at 3-month follow-up
Beck Anxiety Inventory score before operation and at 1-year follow-up
Trail Making Test before operation and at 3-month follow-up
Trail Making Test before operation and at 1-year follow-up

arm_group.description: Postoperative VAS score ≥ 3 points at 3-month follow-up
Postoperative VAS score ≤ 2 points at 3-month follow-up

study_pop.textblock: Patients with CSM undergoing C3-7 open-door laminoplasty.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age: 18~70 years.
- Diagnosed as degenerative cervical spine myelopathy.
- Must receive C3-C7 open-door laminoplasty.
- Agree to join this study and sign the informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe cervical spine kyphosis.
- Cervical spine radiculopathy.
- Laminoplasty with fusion.
- Cervical spine anterior column lesion because of tumor, trauma or infection.
- Severe osteoporosis.
- Morbid obesity.
- patients with mental disorder.
- Pregnancy.
- History of infection within last 3 months.
- Severe nervous system disease.
- Abnormal laboratory report of liver function, kidney function and hematologic system.
- Poor compliance.
- Patients with other surgical contraindications.
- Patients with intemperance or taking drugs.
- Patients who joined other study within the last 3 months.
- Patients with a chief complaint of neck pain (VAS score ≥3 points).
- Left handedness.
